en.title: Complete Guide to Siberian Cat Coat Colors: Popular Colors and How to Choose
en.content:
The Siberian is a breed with an exceptionally rich variety of coat colors. Even among Siberians, different colors create completely different impressions, making color selection one of the great joys of choosing your cat.

This article introduces the most popular Siberian coat colors and their characteristics.

Main Coat Color Patterns of Siberians

Brown Tabby

This is the most classic and popular color among Siberians. It features a warm brown base with distinct dark brown striped markings (tabby pattern). It gives a wild yet beautiful impression and is the color most associated with the Siberian look. The color deepens as the cat matures, revealing ever richer tones.

Silver Tabby

A silver base with black striped markings. It gives an elegant and glamorous impression. The coat shimmers and sparkles in the light, making it extremely popular.

Red Tabby

A warm orange to red coat color. It gives a bright, lively impression and has the approachable look of a classic ginger tabby.

Blue

A grayish-blue coat color that gives an elegant, refined impression. Solid blue is relatively rare and has a unique beauty.

White

The entire body is covered in pure white fur. A Siberian's luxurious coat gleaming white is strikingly beautiful, and eye colors can vary from blue to green to odd-eyed.

Black Smoke

Appears black at first glance, but the hair roots are white. As the cat moves, the white roots peek through, creating a mysterious impression.

Neva Masquerade

The Neva Masquerade is the pointed color variation of the Siberian. Like a Siamese, darker color appears on the face, ears, paws, and tail, while the body remains a light cream to white. They often have blue eyes and are known for their exceptionally beautiful appearance.

The Neva Masquerade is particularly popular among Siberians, with many fans drawn to its beautiful appearance and gentle personality.

Tips for Choosing a Coat Color

You can choose a coat color based on personal preference. There is no scientifically proven personality difference based on coat color, though individual variation naturally exists. If a particular kitten catches your eye, the best approach is to visit and meet them in person to check compatibility.

Also, kitten coat colors can change as they grow. Tabby patterns in particular may become more defined or shift in tone as the cat matures, making these changes another enjoyable aspect of cat ownership.

zh.title: 西伯利亚猫毛色种类大全：热门色系与选择指南
zh.content:
西伯利亚猫是毛色变化极为丰富的猫种。即使同为西伯利亚猫，不同毛色带来的印象也截然不同，因此选择什么颜色也是一大乐趣。

本文为您介绍西伯利亚猫代表性的毛色种类及其各自的特点。

西伯利亚猫的主要毛色类型

棕色虎斑（Brown Tabby）

这是西伯利亚猫中最经典、最受欢迎的毛色。温暖的棕色底色上带有清晰的深棕色条纹（虎斑纹）。给人一种野性而美丽的印象，也是最能体现西伯利亚猫风貌的颜色。随着成长，色调会变得更加浓郁，展现出更丰富的层次。

银色虎斑（Silver Tabby）

银色底色搭配黑色条纹。给人优雅华丽的印象。被毛在光线下闪闪发亮，非常受欢迎。

红色虎斑（Red Tabby）

温暖的橘色至红色毛色。给人明亮活泼的印象，像橘猫一样亲切可爱。

蓝色（Blue）

带灰调的蓝色毛色，给人优雅沉稳的印象。纯色蓝色较为稀少，有着独特的美感。

白色（White）

全身覆盖纯白被毛。西伯利亚猫丰厚的被毛呈现出白色光泽非常美丽，眼睛颜色也有蓝色、绿色、鸳鸯眼等多种。

黑烟色（Black Smoke）

乍看之下是黑色，但毛根为白色。猫咪活动时白色毛根若隐若现，给人神秘的印象。

涅瓦假面舞会（Neva Masquerade）

涅瓦假面舞会是西伯利亚猫的重点色变种。像暹罗猫一样，脸部、耳朵、四肢和尾巴呈深色，身体则为浅奶油色至白色。多数拥有蓝色眼睛，外表非常美丽。

涅瓦假面舞会在西伯利亚猫中尤其受欢迎，凭借美丽的外表和温和的性格吸引了众多粉丝。

毛色选择小贴士

毛色可以根据个人喜好来选择。毛色与性格之间的差异在科学上尚未得到证实，但个体差异当然存在。如果有心仪的猫咪，最好亲自到猫舍参观，确认彼此的相性。

另外，幼猫的毛色可能会随着成长而变化。特别是虎斑纹会随着成长变得更加清晰，色调也可能发生改变，这种变化也是养猫的乐趣之一。
